subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk, the Devils top scorer who has 13 years and $100 million left on his contract, has not ruled out remaining with in the Russia-based Kontinental Hockey League.
snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk, the Devils top scorer who has 13 years and $100 million left on his contract, has not ruled out remaining with in the Russia-based Kontinental Hockey League.
